select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into t_customer (id,login_name,display_name,password,id_number,tax_id,contact_mobile,contact,status,type,create_time) values (#{id},#{loginName},#{displayName},#{password},#{idNumber},#{taxId},#{contactMobile},#{contact},0,#{type},now())
mapper.select: select id, login_name as loginName, display_name as displayName, password, contact_mobile as contactMobile, contact, type from t_customer where login_name = #{loginName} and status = 0 limit 0,1;
